Title: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
Writer: John Brancato (story by), Michael Ferris (story by), Tedi Sarafian (story by), John Brancato (screenplay by), Michael Ferris (screenplay by)
Actors: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Nick Stahl, Claire Danes, Kristanna Loken
Plot: A machine from a post-apocalyptic future travels back in time to protect a man and a woman from an advanced robotic assassin to ensure they both survive a nuclear attack.
Production: IMF, InterMedia Film Equities Ltd., C-2 Pictures
